executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Zach pitched his company, Freaker USA, on Shark Tank, seeking $200,000 for 10% equity. The Freaker is a stretchable beverage insulator designed to fit any bottle or can, blending functionality with creative branding. Despite entertaining presentation and strong margins, none of the Sharks invested, primarily due to valuation concerns.
nextSteps: Zach continues to operate and market Freaker USA independently, exploring branding and distribution opportunities without Shark investment.
